properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parishuddha pattanamu kroththa Yerooshalemu paramunundi vachchuta Choochitimi bhartha koraku alanka Rimpa badina pendli kumaarthegaa Choochitimi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Simhaasana mandu goppa shabdhamutho Balamuga palikina swaramu vintin Devudu nivasinchu maanavulatho Thaane vaaritho sadaa vasinchun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devudu thaane vaaritho nundi aayana Vaariki thandri yagunu prati baashpa Binduvula thudichi veyun maranamu Dukhamu edpu nikanundadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Modati sangathulu gatinchu chiunde Parikinchumu sarvamu kroththa vaaye Simhaasana mandundi prabhuve palike Nootanamugaa ne chesiti nanenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ee vaakyamu vishwaasulaku yogyamu Satyamai maaranidai yundu neppudu Adi yantamu alphaa omega dappi Gonna vaaniki jalamu litchun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jayinchu vaaru veetannintini Vaarasulai swatantrinchu konduru Aayana vaariki devudai yundi Vaaraayanaku putru lavuduru{/lang-eng}
